2. Check the attendance column for games where the opponent is the Atlanta Falcons (irrelevant if the opponent is not specified as it will always be "opponent" column).

5. Identify and consider only the games before December 19, 1989, as those are the relevant games for this claim.
6. Check the attendance values for these selected games to determine if there is an attendance value over 72000.

Based on the table:
- The Atlanta Falcons played on September 22, 1989, which is before December 19, 1989. Their attendance was 65153, which is greater than 72000.
- However, no other game prior to December 19, 1989, has an attendance of over 72000.
